trans-unit.source: Additionally, a TorchBeast agent is bundled in nle.agent together with a simple model to provide a starting point for experiments:
trans-unit.target: Additionally, a TorchBeast agent is bundled in nle.agent together with a simple model to provide a starting point for experiments:

trans-unit.source: After installation, one can try out any of the provided tasks as follows:
trans-unit.target: インストール後、以下のように提供されたタスクを試すことができます。

trans-unit.target: マインアールエル

trans-unit.target: ミニグリッド

trans-unit.source: NLE also comes with a few scripts that allow to get some environment rollouts, and play with the action space:
trans-unit.target: NLEはまた、いくつかの環境のロールアウトを取得し、アクションスペースで遊ぶことができますいくつかのスクリプトが付属しています。

trans-unit.source: NLE requires python>=3.7, cmake>=3.12, libzmq, flatbuffers, and some NetHack dependencies (e.g. libncurses) to be installed and available both when building the package, and at runtime.
trans-unit.target: NLE requires python>=3.7 , cmake>=3.12 , libzmq , flatbuffers , and some NetHack dependencies (e.g. libncurses ) to be installed and available both when building the package, and at runtime.

trans-unit.source: NOTE: If you want to extend / develop NLE, please install the package as follows:
trans-unit.target: NOTE:NLEを拡張/開発する場合は、以下のようにパッケージをインストールしてください。

trans-unit.source: NetHack is one of the oldest and arguably most impactful videogames in history, as well as being one of the hardest roguelikes currently being played by humans. It is procedurally generated, rich in entities and dynamics, and overall an extremely challenging environment for current state-of-the-art RL agents, while being much cheaper to run compared to other challenging testbeds. Through NLE, we wish to establish NetHack as one of the next challenges for research in decision making and machine learning.
trans-unit.target: NetHackは、歴史上最も古く、最もインパクトのあるビデオゲームの一つであり、現在人間がプレイしているローグライクの中で最も難しいゲームの一つでもあります。手続き的に生成され、実体やダイナミクスが豊富で、現在の最新のRLエージェントにとっては非常に挑戦的な環境であると同時に、他の挑戦的なテストベッドに比べてはるかに安価に実行することができます。私たちは、NLEを通じて、NetHackを意思決定や機械学習の研究における次の課題の一つとして確立したいと考えています。

trans-unit.source: Note that nle.scripts.play can also be run with nle-play, if the package has been properly installed.
trans-unit.target: Note that nle.scripts.play can also be run with nle-play , if the package has been properly installed.

trans-unit.source: Related Environments
trans-unit.target: 関連環境

trans-unit.source: Starting with NLE environments is extremely simple, provided one is familiar with other gym / RL environments.
trans-unit.target: NLE環境から始めるのは、他のジム/RL環境に慣れていれば非常に簡単です。

trans-unit.source: The NetHack Learning Environment (NLE) is a Reinforcement Learning environment based on NetHack 3.6.6. NLE is designed to provide a standard RL interface to the game, and comes with tasks that function as a first step to evaluate agents on this new environment.
trans-unit.target: The NetHack Learning Environment (NLE) is a Reinforcement Learning environment based on NetHack 3.6.6. NLE is designed to provide a standard RL interface to the game, and comes with tasks that function as a first step to evaluate agents on this new environment.

trans-unit.source: The NetHack Learning Environment (NLE): a reinforcement learning environment based on NetHack
trans-unit.target: NetHack学習環境(NLE):NetHackをベースとした強化学習環境

trans-unit.source: We have provided some docker images. Please see the relevant README.
trans-unit.target: We have provided some docker images. Please see the relevant README.

trans-unit.source: You can read more about NLE in the arXiv preprint, and about NetHack in its original README, at nethack.org, and on the NetHack wiki.
